# Onboarding Checklist

## Purpose
Checklist for onboarding new team members and ensuring project-specific onboarding is complete. Covers access, environments, documentation, and mentor pairing.

**Owners:** Onboarding Coordinator, Documentation Owner

---

## New Team Member Onboarding

### Administrative Setup
- [ ] HR paperwork completed
- [ ] Employee ID / badge issued
- [ ] Email account created and accessible
- [ ] Added to company directory and org chart
- [ ] Benefits enrollment completed (if applicable)

### System Access
- [ ] GitHub organization membership granted
- [ ] Repository access configured (appropriate teams/permissions)
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline access (read/write as appropriate)
- [ ] Cloud platform access (AWS, Azure, GCP as needed)
- [ ] Internal tools access (Jira, Confluence, Slack, etc.)
- [ ] VPN access configured (if required)
- [ ] SSO/MFA setup completed

### Development Environment
- [ ] Development machine provisioned
- [ ] IDE and tooling installed
- [ ] Local development environment setup guide provided
- [ ] Code repository cloned and buildable locally
- [ ] Sample project or "hello world" completed successfully

### Documentation & Training
- [ ] Company handbook reviewed
- [ ] Project management overview reviewed ([octoacme-project-management-overview.md](../octoacme-project-management-overview.md))
- [ ] Roles and personas document reviewed ([octoacme-roles-and-personas.md](../octoacme-roles-and-personas.md))
- [ ] Team-specific processes documented and shared
- [ ] Security policies and guidelines reviewed

### Team Integration
- [ ] Mentor/buddy assigned
- [ ] Introductions to team members completed
- [ ] Added to relevant Slack channels / communication groups
- [ ] Recurring meetings added to calendar
- [ ] First 1:1 with manager scheduled

---

## Project-Specific Onboarding

### Project Context
- [ ] Project charter / one-pager reviewed
- [ ] Current roadmap and milestones reviewed
- [ ] Active sprint/iteration goals understood
- [ ] Key stakeholders identified and introduced

### Technical Onboarding
- [ ] Architecture overview provided
- [ ] Key technical decisions and ADRs reviewed
- [ ] Codebase walkthrough completed
- [ ] Testing strategy and practices reviewed
- [ ] Deployment process and environments explained

### First Contributions
- [ ] Assigned first "good first issue" or starter task
- [ ] First PR submitted and merged
- [ ] Code review process experienced (as author and reviewer)
- [ ] Successfully deployed code to staging (if applicable)

### Knowledge Transfer
- [ ] Domain-specific documentation reviewed
- [ ] Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) for key areas identified
- [ ] Access to historical context (past decisions, retros)
- [ ] Known issues and tech debt areas highlighted

---

## Onboarding Timeline

| Milestone | Target Timeframe | Status |
|-----------|------------------|--------|
| Day 1: Admin & access setup | Day 1 | |
| Week 1: Environment setup & team intro | End of Week 1 | |
| Week 2: Project context & first task | End of Week 2 | |
| Month 1: Independent contributions | End of Month 1 | |
| 90-Day: Fully ramped | End of Month 3 | |
